name: A. A Good Contest
statement:
Codeforces user’ handle color depends on his rating it is red if his
rating is greater or equal to ; it is orange if his rating is less than
but greater or equal to , etc. Each time participant takes part in a
rated contest, his rating is changed depending on his performance.Anton
wants the color of his handle to become red. He considers his
performance in the rated contest to be if he outscored some participant,
whose handle was colored red before the contest and his rating has
increased after it.Anton has written a program that analyses contest
results and determines whether he performed good or not. Are you able to
do the same?
